description:
An open-source bluetooth file manager for the Wahoo ELEMNT Bolt. An open-source bluetooth file manager for the Wahoo ELEMNT Bolt. Supports
  • browsing, transferring, and deleting files,
  • files can include recorded rides, route directions, and plans,
  • starting routes/plans from internal directories,
  • converting FIT files to GPX when receiving.
Gives access to both the USB directory and the internal routes and plans directories. Routes and plans can also be started from the file manager.
